MyPage.ters_of_use_content:
Terms of Service
SpackAI Analyst Terms of Service
These Terms set forth the rules and regulations governing the use of the Service between Spacespace (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") and the User. By using the Service, you are deemed to have agreed to these Terms. These Terms stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the User and the Company in relation to the Company's provision of the Service.
Article 1 Purpose
The purpose of these Terms is to stipulate the rights, obligations, and responsibilities between the User and the Company in using the AI Analyst Platform Spatial Analyst Service (hereinafter referred to as the "Service").
Article 2 Definition of Terms
The term "Service" refers to the AI Analyst Platform Spatial Analyst Service provided by the Company. The term "User" refers to a person who agrees to these Terms and Conditions and uses the Service provided by the Company. "Member" refers to a person who subscribes to the Service and uses the Service provided by the Company. The term "Site" refers to the website operated by Spacespace Co., Ltd. to provide the Service.
Article 3 Effect and Amendment of Terms
These Terms stipulate the rights and obligations between the User and the Company in using the Service.
These Terms shall be effective upon posting on the site operated by the Company.
The Company may amend these Terms if necessary, and if the Terms are changed, the effective date and changes will be posted on the site. The revised Terms will be effective immediately upon posting.
Article 4 Provision and Use of Services
The Company provides the Spec AI Analyst Service, which combines real-time corporate disclosure information with analyzed data from 40,000 daily news reports, to users.
Membership registration is required to use the Service. When registering for membership, you must provide the information requested by the Company, and the information you provide must always be accurate and up to date.
The Company endeavors to protect your personal information, which is governed by the Privacy Policy.
You must comply with the following when using the Service. You shall: 
Not use other people's information and personal information fraudulently; 
Not violate any laws, regulations, terms of use, etc. by using the Service; 
Not harm the safety, reliability, and efficiency of the Service; 
Not engage in any behavior that defames or disadvantages others; 
The Company may restrict the use of the Service to any user who violates these Terms.Article 5 Modification and Discontinuation of the Service
The Company may modify, change, or discontinue part or all of the Service in accordance with the quality improvement and operational needs of the Service
The Company will notify you in advance of any modification or discontinuation of the Service, and the Company shall not be liable for any damages arising therefrom
Article 6 Copyright and Intellectual Property Rights
All copyrights and intellectual property rights to the Service created by the Company belong to the Company
You may not process, sell, reproduce, or distribute information posted on the Service without the prior consent of the Company. 
Article 7 Disclaimer
The Company shall not be liable for any damages incurred by the User in using the Service
The Company shall not be liable for providing the Service if the Company is unable to provide the Service due to force majeure reasons such as natural disasters, war, or suspension of service by a telecommunications carrier. 
Article 8 Dispute Resolution
If any matter not specified in these Terms arises, it will be resolved in accordance with relevant laws and the Company's internal regulations.
Addendum
These Terms will be effective from July 8, 2024.
Please read these Terms carefully before using the Service. By using the Service, you agree to these Terms. We will do our best to provide you with better services in the future
MyPage.privacy_policy_content:
Privacy Policy
SpackAI Analyst Privacy Policy
Space (hereinafter referred to as the "Company") values the privacy of its users and complies with the Act on Promotion of Information and Communications Network Utilization and Information Protection. This Privacy Policy describes how the Company collects, uses, and protects your personal information:
Items of personal information collected and how it is collected
Items of personal information collected
Identifying information of the user (name, email address, etc.)
Information generated in the process of using the service (log data, cookies, session information, etc.)
How personal information is collected
Provided voluntarily by the user when registering for membership and using the service
Automatically collected in the process of using the service (cookies, etc.)
Purpose of collecting and using personal informationThe Company utilizes the collected personal information for the following purposes. 
Provision and operation of services
Identification, authentication, and age verification for member management and service provision
Improvement of services and development of new services
Provision of customized services suitable for users
Period of retention and use of personal informationThe Company shall destroy the information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using the user's personal information is achieved. However, if it is required to be preserved by relevant laws and regulations, it may be kept in accordance with such laws and regulations.
Provision and consignment of personal informationThe Company does not provide or consign your personal information to third parties. However, exceptions may be made only with your consent or as required by law.
Destruction of personal informationThe Company will destroy the information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using personal information has been fulfilled. The method and deadline for destruction will be in accordance with relevant laws and regulations.
Measures to ensure the safety of personal informationThe Company takes the following measures to ensure the safety of your personal information:
Encryption of personal information processing systems
Installation and operation of various security systems against hacking
Training and monitoring of personal information processing employees
Your rights and obligationsYou have the right to access, correct, delete, or suspend processing of your personal information. Requests in this regard can be submitted through the Company's customer center.
Privacy OfficerThe Company has designated a privacy officer as follows to be responsible for the overall handling of personal information and to handle user complaints and damage relief related to the handling of personal information:
Name: Minho Yeom
Department: CEO
Email: admin@ymsco.site
Addendum
This Privacy Policy is effective from July 8, 2024.
When the Company revises the Privacy Policy, the Company will notify users of the revisions through a notice.
